Question: This person had another attack of nerves during the first set, which drew a muted reaction.
Hints: This person was overcome by stage fright the first time, but succeeded in performing the following week.
After the tour, the single "Burning Love" was released—this person's last top ten hit on the U.S.
B.B King recalled that he knew this person before he was popular when they both used to frequent Beale Street.
